results.title: Tintin in Tibet
results.creator_credit: Stephane Bernasconi, Foundation Herge, Nelvana and Ellipse
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventures of Tintin”.
When Tintin reads a newspaper report of a Nepalese air disaster, little does he know that his vacation is about to take him to the Himalayas and adventure! Tintin’s dear friend Chang is aboard the crashed plane and although there are no reported survivors, Tintin is sure that Chang is alive. With Captain Haddock’s help they battle blizzards and the Yeti to find Chang.

results.title: The Blue lotus
results.creator_credit: Stephane Bernasconi, Robert Rea, Nelvana and Ellipse
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventures of Tintin”.
In the midst of a battle with smugglers, Tintin arrives in China, where he rescues a drowning Chang, a real-life friend of Herge who developed “The Adventures of Tintin”. Tintin must use all his courage, daring and intelligence to outsmart the traps of his enemies.

results.title: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley
results.brief_description: Mystery, action and songs abound as Detectives Mary-Kate and Ashley undertake a set of daring advetures. These trenchcoat twins and their dog Clue live by their agency motto to “solve any crime by dinner time.”

results.title: Detective Blinky; Blink Bill's wedding picnic.
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventures of Blinky Bill”.
Two adventures with Australia’s most lovable Koala. “Detective Blinky”: Someone is stealing the berries from the town’s only Mulgaberry bush. Detective Blinky is on the case with Splodge to catch the culprit. “Blinky Bill’s wedding picnic”: Blinky’s mother and Nutsy’s father are getting married and a big celebration is planned. At the wedding picnic, everyone has a good time and the Dingos finally learn to live in harmony with everyone.

results.title: The Adventures of Blinky Bill
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description: Blinky Bill is one of the most loved characters in Australian children’s literature. He and his friends get up to many adventures in the bush in this popular animated series.

results.title: Clyde Beatty's animal thrills (D)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventure parade”.
Takes you inside the confines of “Clyde Beatty’s zoo” - a replica of an African jungle in Fort Lauderdale, Texas. Shows Clyde Beatty - one of “the greatest animal trainers of all time” - go toe-to-toe with lions and tigers in dangerous performances. NB: Contains disturbing footage re cruelty to animals.

results.title: Caged fury (D)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventure parade”.
WARNING: CONTAINS VISUALLY DISTURBING IMAGES Man’s capture and training of wild African beasts. The animals are seen in their native surroundings and the continual struggle for survival is depicted in scenes of fighting and killing. Shows the animals being trapped and shipped abroad, and the training methods through which they gradually adapt themselves to a new life.

results.title: Lion - tiger fight! (D)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventure parade”.
A pre World War II edited news/show-reel, a dramatic and adventurous expedition into the wild jungles of India. Mostly contrived and very little adherance to actual fact. The pith-helmeted hunters eventually capture a tiger and…a lion! They soberly watch on as the two cats fight to the death. NB: SOME SCENES MAY DISTURB
